participant_1.name: Max Steele
participant_1.personality: Max is outgoing, energetic, and passionate about helping others. He thrives in social settings and enjoys motivating those around him.
participant_1.background: i'm a professional wrestler. i volunteer in a homeless shelter. in my spare time i do volunteer work. i like to workout a a times a week. i enjoy being around people.

participant_2.name: Emily Johnson
participant_2.personality: Emily is friendly, fun-loving, and always up for a good time. She enjoys connecting with people and has a laid-back attitude towards life.
participant_2.background: i live in alabama. i like tacos. i have one brother. i have three sisters.
